movie.title: Grand Piano
movie.actors: Elijah Wood, John Cusack, Kerry Bishe, Tamsin Egerton
movie.plot: During his comeback performance, a pianist who suffers from stage fright finds a note "play one note wrong, and you die".
movie.tomatoConsensus: Grand Piano is so tense in its best moments -- and appealingly strange overall -- that it remains rewarding in spite of its flaws.
